item.title: New blog, again
item.description:
New blog

Hi. This is my new blog. Again. Here I’ll post some how-to’s and description of my projects. Probably. I hope won’t abandon it again.

Microblog

If you want to read shorter chaotic twitter-like posts, you can also follow my rss-only feed: http://0x1d107.xyz/txtlog/0x1d107.xml. Here I share the links to projects of my interest and other stuff. warning: contains swearing and russian language.
